attributes.action: Make SATS easier. SATS have been getting harder every year.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do it because children are struggling not how the did a few years ago.
attributes.background: Make SATS tests easier. My cousins paper is easier Than the one I did

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the difficulty of SATs. However it's not clear whether you want the Government to ease the requirements on pupils taking SATs, for pupils' completed tests to be assessed more leniently, or something else.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

'Replace SAT's with lower stress, effective teacher assessments': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598018
